title: College grad looking for a job - unemployed

content.prompt: Which of the following individuals is classified as unemployed?

choices.label: A fifteen-year-old high school student who is looking for a babysitting job
A laid-off computer programmer who has given up looking for a new job
A parent who works in an after-school day care center for 15 hours a week
A recent college graduate who is looking for her first job
A mayor who lost an election and retired

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
